short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically switches YouTube & Other videos to the highest/selected available quality.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate Your YouTube and Video Experience to New Heights

Welcome to a seamless video experience with Auto Max Quality Pro – the evolution of YouTube Max Quality Switcher. Our extension is now your premier tool, ensuring your videos always play in the highest quality automatically. Enjoy this luxury not just on YouTube but also on Google Drive and any platform using the Google YouTube video API. Prepare for an unparalleled crisp and clear viewing journey!

🌟 Key Features:

👑 Auto-Enhanced Quality: Enjoy the best viewing without lifting a finger; our extension ensures you're watching videos in peak quality consistently.

⏲️ Tailored Timing: Adjust the timing of the extension's automatic quality adjustment to suit your unique browsing needs.

🔄 Extended Compatibility: Benefit from the highest video quality across multiple platforms, including YouTube, Google Drive, and others using the Google YouTube video API.

🛠️ Effortless Installation: Upgrade your streaming experience swiftly with our easy one-click installation.

🌟 Custom Quality Control: Choose your preferred video quality with ease, a refined feature from our latest updates.

🆕 [NEW] Advanced Logger & Stats: Keep track of your quality settings and identify your go-to resolutions with our improved, user-friendly logging tool.

🆕 [NEW] Revamped UI: Inspired by your valuable feedback, we've overhauled the UI for a more intuitive and fluid experience, enhancing the extension's usability and navigation.

Don't compromise when excellence is within reach. Elevate to the Auto Max Quality Pro extension today and dive into a realm of unparalleled video clarity!

Install Now and Embrace Unrivaled Clarity!
